mode.description: Renders one segment per beat in order.
mode.name: SequentialSegments

mode.description: Render all segments in order in one beat.
mode.name: RunThroughSegments

mode.description: Render a random segment per beat.
mode.name: RandomSegment

mode.description: Render a different segment per frame
mode.name: FastRandomSegment

mode.description: Renders segment in branch level augmenting every beat
mode.name: SegmentBranch

mode.description: Render throught all the branch levels in one beat.
mode.name: RunThroughBranches

mode.description: Cycles through colors of the pallette
mode.name: RepetitionColor

mode.description: Primary color that should change every beat.
mode.name: RandomPrimaryColor

mode.description: Cycles through primary colors on beat.
mode.name: PrimaryBeatColor

mode.description: Random red green and blue value every frame.
mode.name: RGB

mode.description: HSB fade goes along with millis.
mode.name: MillisFade

mode.description: Pics a position in relation to a segment
mode.name: Interpolator

mode.description: Moves along segment, but halfway to center.
mode.name: HalfWayInterpolator

mode.description: Provides an expanding random position between segment and center.
mode.name: RandomExpandingInterpolator

mode.description: Provides random position between segment and center.
mode.name: RandomInterpolator

mode.description: Prototype thing that offsets the position according to segments X position.
mode.name: SegmentOffsetInterpolator

mode.description: Template custom shape, add template to geometryGroup and press `ctrl-d` to set as custom shape.
mode.name: custom

mode.description: Place brush onto segment. Affected by `e`.
mode.name: BrusPainter

mode.description: Makes a line between pointA and a position.
mode.name: FunLine

mode.description: Draws a line on a segment, not animated.
mode.name: FullLine

mode.description: line that expands from the middle of a segment.
mode.name: MiddleLine

mode.description: Line that comes out of point A and exits through pointB
mode.name: TrainLine

mode.description: Draw a line from center to position.
mode.name: Maypole

mode.description: Draws a line from a point on a segment to a point on a different segment. Affected by `e`
mode.name: SegToSeg

mode.description: modulates alpha channel, made for LEDs
mode.name: AlphaLine

mode.description: Fit a bunch of text on a segment
mode.name: TextWritter

mode.description: Makes a expanding circle with segment as final radius.
mode.name: Elliptic

mode.description: Render mode for drawing with brushes
mode.name: BrushSegment

mode.description: Things that render per each segment
mode.name: PersegmentRender

mode.description: Render things evenly spaced with a fixed one at the begining and end
mode.name: EvenlySpacedWithZero

mode.description: RenderMultiples but make em go faster
mode.name: ExpoSpaced

mode.description: render per geometry from left to right
mode.name: SweepingEnabler

mode.description: render per geometry from right to left
mode.name: SwoopingEnabler
